## Project Structure

- Root: `thelysdexicone.github.io` is a monorepo for GitHub Pages frontends.
- Landing page: `landing-page/` (Next.js App Router) serves the root URL.
- Projects: `projects/<project-id>/` (Next.js apps) serve as subpaths.
  - **ball-x-pit/** - Ball X Pit companion (placeholder)
  - **icarus/** - Icarus survival companion (placeholder)
  - **kingdom-come-deliverance-ii/** - Kingdom Come: Deliverance II guide (placeholder)
  - **blue-prince/** - Blue Prince strategy guide (placeholder)
  - **factorio/** - Factorio optimization tools (placeholder)
  - **satisfactory/** - Satisfactory factory planner (placeholder)
  - **widget-inc/** - Widget Inc. production guide (placeholder)
- Shared code: `shared/` for reusable styles and utilities.
- Build output: `dist/` (generated by `npm run deploy`).

**Note:** `ball-x-pit-companion` is maintained in a separate repository and is not part of this monorepo.

## Dev Commands

- Install all: `npm run install-all`
- Landing dev: `npm run dev:landing`
- Project dev examples:
  - `npm run dev:ball-x-pit` (port 3001)
  - `npm run dev:icarus` (port 3002)
  - `npm run dev:kingdom-come` (port 3003)
  - `npm run dev:blue-prince` (port 3004)
  - `npm run dev:factorio` (port 3005)
  - `npm run dev:satisfactory` (port 3006)
  - `npm run dev:widget-inc` (port 3007)
- Build all: `npm run build`
- Deploy build: `npm run deploy`

## GitHub Pages Notes

- Each project uses `output: 'export'`.
- Production uses `basePath` and `assetPrefix` per project.
- `.nojekyll` is required for Next.js static exports.
- All projects are currently placeholders showing "Coming Soon".

## Documentation Rules

- AI-generated docs go only in `.github/documentation/`.
- `.github/documentation/` is ignored by git.
- Do not add new docs outside that folder unless explicitly requested.
